Package org.openimaj.demos.faces

Copyright (c) 2011, The University of Southampton and the individual contributors.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CLMMultiTrackerDemo
    Demo for the CLMFaceTracker using a webcam.
    KLTHaarFaceTrackerDemo
    A demo of the KLT/HaarCascade face tracker
    ModelManipulatorGUI
    Provides a user interface for interacting with the parameters of the trained CLM Model.
    MultiPuppeteer
    Demo showing real-time face mapping.
    Mustache
    Mustache demo
    Mustache.VideoMustache
